text:
Created attachment 22565
Patch to add break tags

In the examples for rewrite flags S and T, some of the directives show up joined onto the end of previous lines, turning them into comments.  It looks as if a few break tags are missing.  The attached patch puts them in.

The doc source file is docs/manual/rewrite/rewrite_flags.xml

Built on trunk without warnings, and the resulting english html looks good.
creator: poirier@pobox.com
noodl@apache.org
text: Patch applied to trunk (r696313) and 2.2 (r696317), thanks.
